description: Non-REM RDI at 5% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-REM sleep associated with >= 5% desat) / (hours of NREM sleep)]
calculation: rdinr5p  = 60*(hnrbp5 + hnrop5 + canbp5 + canop5 + oanbp5 + oanop5) / (slpprdp - minremp)

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-rem RDI at 5% desat
